snippet: A statistical analyst said Ahmad Bradshaw's 6-yard touchdown run may have been the most counterproductive score of all time.
abstract: A statistical analyst said Ahmad Bradshaw's 6-yard touchdown run may have been the most counterproductive score of all time.
lead_paragraph: Brian Burke of Advanced NFL Stats, writing for the Slate/Deadspin N.F.L. Roundtable, has analyzed whether the Patriots put one over on the Giants in the final minute of the Super Bowl.

headline.main: Why Bradshaw Should Have Taken a Knee at the 1-Yard Line
